evSOLve.JEvolution.selection

Class DecimationSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • evSOLve.JEvolution.selection.Selection
      • evSOLve.JEvolution.selection.DecimationSelection

  • public class DecimationSelection
extends Selection
    Decimation Selection is used to chop the seed population, if it is larger than the set population size. It is a truncation or could be viewed as (mu, lambda) selection from ES.
    Since:
    August 22, 2001 $Id: DecimationSelection.java 560 2014-04-28 17:45:54Z helmut $
    Version:
    0.9.8
    Author:
    Helmut A. Mayer

    • Method Detail

      • doSelect

        public void doSelect(SubPopulation parents,
            SubPopulation offspring)
        JEvolution native selection method. Decimation is simply a truncation of an over-sized population to the set population size.
        Specified by:
        doSelect in class Selection
        Parameters:
        parents - the SubPopulation under pressure
        offspring - the SubPopulation of survivors
